name: Axis
tagline: Hand Gesture-Based Mouse Controller for macOS - MediaPipe-Powered Touchless Interface
description: A native macOS application that enables full mouse control through hand gestures using MediaPipe hand tracking

Features: pinch-to-click cursor control, drag & select, scroll gestures (one/two finger flicks), zoom gestures (thumb+middle/ring pinches), real-time overlay visualization with gesture feedback, configurable sensitivity and smoothing via OneEuroFilter

name: todo-purge
tagline: CLI tool that turns TODOs/FIXMEs → Linear tickets in one command
description: A CLI tool that addresses the classic TODO fallacy - converting forgotten TODOs and FIXMEs into actionable Linear tickets
Because as much as we hope it'll happen, we're not coming back to that TODO

name: Fashion:Week
tagline: Scroll-based Archive Fashion Platform - Merged w/ Lowheads (10M+ ARR)
description: React Native + Expo mobile frontends, Supabase relational/vector databases, Powersync data synchronization

Trained collaborative-filtering based recommender system using Pytorch -- powered by on-demand Modal clusters; Semantic search infra: 1M+ CLIP embedding vectors + cosine similarity querying + hybrid BM25-α reranking

name: Posthuman
tagline: Blockchain-Enabled Digital Legacy and Estate Management Platform (TreeHacks 2025)
description: Built Next.js frontend and backend, Elasticsearch + Supabase databases, and EigenLayer blockchain verification
Mistral-7B + Elasticsearch for on-device 'posthumous chat'; LumaAI + ElevenLabs + custom-optimized MuseTalk VAE model for audiovisual 'memory' generation; cuda GPU-acceleration for inference

name: FormPix
tagline: On-Device-Inference-Powered USCIS Form Filler Chrome Extension
description: Used Tesseract OCR + Liquid AI LFM2-350M to extract data from files and automate USCIS online form filling
Conducted interviews with legal/immigration firms to diagnose pain points -- Contracts with 3 law firms

name: Docker
tagline: College Student Developer Relations Project - 250k+ Social Media Impacts
description: Built AI-powered MERN-stack web app + trained RNN models to create personalized meal plans for Berkeley students based on dining hall menu/dietary preference; Designed microservice architecture enabled by Docker
REST APIs for the backend (Node/Express) & AI models (TensorFlow/Flask) microservices; Hosted on GCP

name: High-Frequency Tactile Transducer
tagline: Audio-to-Tactile Translation Device for Hearing-Impaired Music Experience
description: A device that translates audio signals (especially high-frequency audio) into tactile sensations for audibly impaired individuals, creating a more complete musical experience
The mission is to enable individuals to experience, not only the bass in music, but treble as well

name: Survive! - The Game
description: A Java game where your plane crash landed and you're stuck on the island Fugaji
Survival mechanics: you're cold, alone, and hungry - eat fruit to survive!

name: S1XT33N - Voice Controlled Car
tagline: Voice-Command Autonomous Robot Car with Signal Processing
description: A robot car built with breadboards, wires, and wheels that listens to voice commands then drives on that command's pre-determined path

Employed Digital-to-Analog and Analog-to-Digital Converters, motion sensors, band-pass filter circuits, System ID, Principal Component Analysis, and Singular Value Decomposition to build, test, and tune the car

name: 2write.app
tagline: AI-Powered Essay Writing Assistant Web Application
description: A web-app writing software that uses AI to supplement user-inputted text for essay writing

2write.app implements AI to support users in writing essays by generating prompts/outlines, completing sentences, and suggesting ideas. This creates an experience that facilitates higher quality writing that's undetectable as AI

name: FoodShelf
tagline: iOS Food Classification App with CoreML (SciFair 2021)
description: Designed and developed a native iOS app using SwiftUI and Apple's CoreML to classify leftover foods
Determines how long foods can be stored or composted based on classification results

name: Disease Diagnosing Statistical Classification Algorithm
tagline: Statistical Classification System for Underserved Healthcare Diagnostics (SciFair 2020)
description: Developed a Python program that uses statistical classification methods to determine what diseases a person might have based on their symptoms
Prioritized diseases prevalent in less-developed countries (i.e. Malaria, Tuberculosis, etc.) to offer a solution for individuals in medically underserved areas
